name: AI Analytics Dashboard Launch
query: Announce our new AI-powered analytics dashboard that automatically identifies trends and predicts customer churn with 95% accuracy. Save 10 hours per week on manual data analysis. Available now for Pro and Enterprise plans. Book a demo to see it in action.
description: B2B SaaS company launching a new AI feature that solves a major pain point for enterprise customers.

expected_results.best_content_type: Product screenshots, ROI stats, demo video
